snippet.title: The First Final Fantasy Compilation | Final Fantasy I & II Famicom Combo Cart
snippet.description:
Final Fantasy compilations are not lost on fans of the series. While numerous bundles have been released throughout the years, many fans outside of Japan may not be aware of the cart that started it all - Final Fantasy I & II for the Famicom. This video breaks down what this thing is, differences from the original versions and more. 

You can check this out in written form over on our website here: https://www.thefamicast.com/2023/11/final-fantasy-i-ii-famicom-combo-cart.html

00:00 Intro
00:45 Original Release
01:52 The Combo Cart
04:32 Lead up to Release
06:37 Collector's Corner
08:36 Conclusion

Sources
https://www.jp.square-enix.com/game/detail/ff/
https://www.jp.square-enix.com/game/detail/ff2/
https://nlab.itmedia.co.jp/games/articles/0912/17/news104.html
https://www.jp.square-enix.com/game/detail/ff1-2/
https://www.jp.square-enix.com/game/detail/ff6/
https://sites.google.com/site/gamedatalibrary/hardware-comparer?authuser=0
https://sites.google.com/site/gamedatalibrary/list-of-million-sellers?authuser=0
https://finalfantasy.fandom.com/wiki/Evil_Eye_(Final_Fantasy)
https://finalfantasy.fandom.com/wiki/Death_Eye
https://www.poundsterlinglive.com/bank-of-england-spot/historical-spot-exchange-rates/usd/USD-to-JPY-1994
